description: Describes a component and lists the resources that are grouped together in a component.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

nested_items.name: ApplicationComponent
nested_items.description: Describes a standalone resource or similarly grouped resources that the application is made up of.

nested_items.name: ComponentRemarks
nested_items.description: If logging is supported for the resource type, indicates whether the component has configured logs to be monitored.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type. Supported resource types include EC2 instances, Auto Scaling group, Classic ELB, Application ELB, and SQS Queue.

nested_items.name: OsType
nested_items.description: The operating system of the component.

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: The stack tier of the application component.

nested_items.name: Monitor
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the application component is monitored.

nested_items.name: DetectedWorkload
nested_items.description: Workloads detected in the application component.

nested_items.name: ResourceList
nested_items.description: The list of resource ARNs that belong to the component.
